divs: sighting detailsi work at a tattoo shop , went outside for a cigarette , and noticed a triangular craft flying from west to east. i was about 20 miles east of buffalo , new york , right before christmas of 2012. it was around 7-8pm , i don't know what day of the week it was. i looked up to the north northwest and seen this craft that was flying by right above the shop , parallel with county road the shop is on. i could hear a slight humming \ buzzing , i ran inside to get a friend , and she came out and witnessed it as well. it was triangular in shape , seemed like it was way too low , had 4-6 lights on it. as it flew by , i had a good clear view , it seemed like the back edge of it was a hologram or went through a blurry change with no hard line to define the back edge of the craft. also when it did this another light seemed to appear on the back edge as well. i watched as it flew to the west and slowly went out of sight with no apparent rush. i went back inside and said , " i know i am not crazy " it just flew in a straight line as though it was kind of blurry and morphing , with a few lights on it and no wings or regular engine noise. triangular in shape with some apparent outline , but blurry as well.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Corfu
There was one other sighting in Corfu on or around December 10th 2012
Summary: Triangle with 4-6 lights. body seemed muddy , the back looked like it morhped its edge with extra light as it flew overhead
